organizations: N.F.L. Hall of Famer Deion Sanders
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. Hall of Famer Deion Sanders is no longer affiliated with the Texas charter school he co-founded after a confrontation with an administrator.
snippet: The N.F.L. Hall of Famer Deion Sanders is no longer affiliated with the Texas charter school he co-founded after a confrontation with an administrator.
